title: Application Security
description: Master the essentials of protecting cloud environments. Learn strategies for securing cloud-based systems from threats.

quiz.question: What is the primary goal of network security?
options: To protect data as it moves across or between networks
quiz._answer: To protect data as it moves across or between networks

quiz.question: What is the main function of a firewall?
options: To monitor and control network traffic based on security rules
quiz._answer: To monitor and control network traffic based on security rules

quiz.question: What is the difference between IDS and IPS?
options: IDS alerts administrators of suspicious activity, while IPS takes action to prevent attacks
IDS encrypts data, while IPS monitors traffic
IDS is for remote access, while IPS is for local access
IDS provides secure communication, while IPS manages network traffic
quiz._answer: IDS alerts administrators of suspicious activity, while IPS takes action to prevent attacks

quiz.question: What does a VPN do?
options: Encrypts data sent over the internet
Provides a barrier between trusted and untrusted networks
quiz._answer: Encrypts data sent over the internet

quiz.question: What is one of the key benefits of using encryption in network security?
options: Protecting sensitive data both at rest and in transit
